urls.title: 5 Things to Do in Chicago on a Budget
urls.description: With its rich history, infamous sports team, and unparalleled food scene, it’s no wonder people love to visit Chicago.

data.text: With its rich history, infamous sports teams, and unparalleled food scene, it’s no wonder people love to visit Chicago. We have compiled some of the best budget-friendly ways to enjoy Chicago. Fares as low as $59! https://t.co/sf6jLipA3g @fly2ohare @fly2midway https://t.co/q33B5qK7HB

urls.title: It's Time to Slow Down and Take a Vacation to Costa Rica!
urls.description: Say hello to Frontier's newest plane tail, the Two Toed Sloth from Costa Rica! We have low fares to Costa Rica so you can get there quick so then you can take it slow!

data.text:
Say hello to the newest endangered species joining our fleet, the Two Toed Sloth!

The Two Toed Sloth lives in the rainforests of Costa Rica, and is known for it's laid back lifestyle. 🌴
Learn more about the Two Toed Sloth and @Visit_CostaRica here: https://t.co/MnoL5C3Mz0 https://t.co/vMviuHzEsq

domain.name: Travel
domain.description: for travel in specific places and types of travels, e.g., Venezuela travel, Spain travel, road trips

data.text:
We are so excited for the Two Toed Sloth to join our fleet, but he doesn't have a name yet...can you help us pick one? 
Vote in the comments using one of the following emojis: 
✈️ Tico
💙 Tony
💚 Manny
Help us and @Visit_CostaRica to #NameTheSloth! 

#AmericasGreenestAirline https://t.co/vgbRGPkrYM

domain.name: Travel
domain.description: for travel in specific places and types of travels, e.g., Venezuela travel, Spain travel, road trips

urls.title: Green
urls.description: A whole new way to fly.

data.text: At Frontier, we are all about making small changes that have big impacts. Join us in wasting less. Instead of printing your boarding pass, download our mobile app to access it there. Onboard we are transitioning from plastic to biodegradable cups.  https://t.co/9cbFyzjdqT https://t.co/dqjDYjDIHR

Frontier is a proud sponsor of Special Olympics Colorado and helped get athletes to Orlando for the Special Olympics USA Games this week. Team Frontier was at DEN to cheer them on and send them off! 🥇 @SpecOlympicsCO https://t.co/tNn4pRE7Vs

data.text:
Under the sea
Darling it's better
Down where it's wetter

urls.title: Green
urls.description: A whole new way to fly.

data.text: Happy #WorldEnvironmentDay! This day is celebrated to encourage awareness and environmental protection. As America's Greenest Airline, we care about taking care of Mother Earth in all that we do. Join us in treating her with care. 💚🌎 https://t.co/dkWlwVx6vC https://t.co/dBQLGvdZaD

urls.title: International Travel - Frontier
urls.description: Now is the perfect time to travel to Mexico and explore paradise! Find the lowest fares to the best Mexico locations. Some of our favorites include Cancun, Guatemala City, Guadalajara and more! Looking for a unique relaxing getaway? Book the Caribbean as your next adventure. Explore the majestic waterfalls of Jamaica, the turquoise waters of the Bahamas and so much more. When thinking about international travel, put Central America at the top of your list. Central America is known for it's archeological

Book your summer vacation to one of our 5 international destinations, including Monterrey, here: https://t.co/gUAWS8Afjd https://t.co/6jLQ5oTMaD

urls.title: KidsFlyFree
urls.description: At Frontier, we’re committed to families, and what better way to show it than helping Kids Fly Free. That’s right – Kids Fly Free with an adult.

data.text: At Frontier, we’re committed to families, and what better way to show it than by helping Kids Fly Free. All kids 14 and under can fly FREE on select flights with the purchase of a Discount Den member fare. Book Now! https://t.co/WRWsU2uHgM https://t.co/ju6vV7RPzW

urls.title: Green
urls.description: A whole new way to fly.

data.text:
Overpacking is so last year. As America's Greenest Airline, we offer a variety of travel options to encourage passengers to pack on the lighter side. 

Reduction in weight = less of an environmental impact. 💚🌎 https://t.co/fzUokYrue3 #greentravel #ecofriendlytravel https://t.co/7Mm3yMSYh7

urls.title: Frontier Airlines | Cheap Fares | Friendly Service
urls.description: Fly away with Frontier and enjoy our low fares to great places. Save a bundle when you get the WORKS℠ and earn miles towards your next trip with us!

data.text: Hey Houston, Cancun is calling! Last week we launched nonstop service from both @HobbyAirport  and @iah  to Cancun, Mexico.  We now fly to 3 destinations from HOU and 6 from IAH. To celebrate, we are offering fares as low as $99! Book today:  https://t.co/585W7cf6HM https://t.co/bd1qA6Jqv3
We fly with #pride!! Happy #PrideMonth! We look forward to celebrating our LGBTQ team members all month long! https://t.co/qAjQu1HWuC

entity.name: Pride Month
entity.description: Page for Global Pride Month for all years

data.text: Hey Raleigh-Durham! Last week we launched service from @RDUAirport to 5 new exciting cities including: Cincinnati, Indianapolis, New Orleans Detroit and Stewart. To celebrate our growth we're offering fares from @RDUAirport from as low as $69*! Book Today: https://t.co/BQr34rsrLI https://t.co/5gUNK0P667

Today is #FlightAttendantAppreciationDay. On this date each year we celebrate the very special role flight attendants play in global travel and transportation.

Please take a moment to thank our Frontier Flight Attendants for doing what they do both on this day and every day! https://t.co/BsTkhvsQqa
We honor and remember the brave servicemen and women who sacrificed everything to keep us safe. Your memory lives on forever. 🇺🇸❤️ #MemorialDay2022 https://t.co/LIvR3kkLwF

urls.title: Discount Den®
urls.description: With a DISCOUNT DEN® subscription you will have exclusive access to Frontier's LOWEST available fares.

data.text:
Wouldn't it be great to: 

✈️ Be guaranteed the lowest airfare.
🌅 Take a family vacation where your kids can fly for free. 
👍 Have access to exclusive deals.

At Frontier, we offer all of this and more with our Discount Den club! Join today! https://t.co/wNCoACPju9 https://t.co/gPpCLEgvpK

urls.title: Frontier Airlines | Cheap Fares | Friendly Service
urls.description: Fly away with Frontier and enjoy our low fares to great places. Save a bundle when you get the WORKS℠ and earn miles towards your next trip with us!

data.text: Hudson Valley, it's time for vacay! Today we launched nonstop service from @SWFairport  to Atlanta and Raleigh-Durham. We are offering fares as low as $69 on nonstop flights to Raleigh-Durham and $79 on nonstop flights to Atlanta!  https://t.co/585W7cf6HM https://t.co/7aJ0H3U9WT

urls.title: Pratt & Whitney
urls.description: Pratt & Whitney

data.text: As America's Greenest Airline, we are always looking for ways to reduce our carbon footprint. We have partnered with aircraft engine manufacturer @prattandwhitney to build 134 of our A320neo family aircraft with the ultra-efficient GTF engine. https://t.co/keitw7rneU #greentravel https://t.co/oTI0aiIdrM

We spent some time with some of our mechanics at the Frontier hangar and at @DENAirport in honor of #AviationMaintenanceTechnician Appreciation Day, which is TODAY. Get to know our mechanics here: https://t.co/yaN9tzKxed. 

Join our team today! https://t.co/OFh4DgfB2u https://t.co/ZRioui9uKA

Okay, so we have more turtles on our plane tails than the Ninja Turtles have members! That's some serious turtle power! Frontier is dedicated to bringing awareness to endangered species. https://t.co/88q4wxVmAZ 💚 #WorldTurtleDay https://t.co/KCTvN5pg4u

urls.title: Careers
urls.description: Our team members are the key to our success for providing low fares nationwide. Join our team and be a part of a rewarding and fast-paced industry.

data.text:
WELCOME ABOARD! 95 flight attendants graduated yesterday and 43 new first officers join Frontier! 

Come be a part of our growing family and open up your world of opportunities! https://t.co/eXNhr6rApJ https://t.co/p4pLcUPEQv

Join us in recognizing #EndangeredSpeciesDay! Our animal tails are a huge part of Frontier’s story and we’d like to raise awareness and honor our furry friends!

Read about our friends here: https://t.co/vLFn8puFeG https://t.co/XzAOkeAviX

urls.title: Green
urls.description: A whole new way to fly.

data.text: So, how do lighter seats translate to being ‘green’? Well, less weight creates greater fuel efficiency. Weighing 30% less than our older model, the fuel savings provided by our new premium @recaro_as seats is outstanding! Read more here: https://t.co/3OlMttJoO9 https://t.co/CXRPeyhKHD

Do you prefer the aisle, middle, or window seat while flying? ✈️

This photo was drawn from a young passenger and given to our pilots flying from @FlyTPA to @portlandjetport. We think he enjoys the window views as much as we do! 💚💚💚 https://t.co/R3J0KBf4kw

urls.title: FlyFrontier
urls.description: FlyFrontier

data.text: At Frontier, we genuinely believe that the sky is for everyone - from students to teachers, to retirees, to first-time fliers. That's why we offer flexibility. Flexibility allows you to control the options you have when flying. https://t.co/KWd4X4zkeu https://t.co/CpH9rWfRAz

Us + the Bahamas = Love at first flight. Check out this guide to vacationing in the Bahamas from @phillymag. https://t.co/A09LIZqDh3

Flights to the @VisitTheBahamas from just $74* at https://t.co/xkrkYvHsdD! https://t.co/QhMzmRej89

urls.title: Pilot
urls.description: We know pilots are the heart of our airline so we offer competitive benefits and flight privileges for you and your family.

data.text: One usually might toss rice as a symbolic wish for a life of prosperity & fruitfulness, but in this case, First Officer Amanda Vogt & her family cut "Fly Frontier" into their rice field as a celebratory sign of her being hired on as a pilot with Frontier! https://t.co/b2lPknNpuw https://t.co/gDD2zH3fu3
One thing is for sure - we are crushin’ on the Caribbean. Today we launched our new non-stop service from @iflymia to Kingston, Jamaica! 🇯🇲 https://t.co/NvJ0FeS5oe https://t.co/unsN2J5UGn

Han Yolo with prices So-Low!  Save 80%* off your next flight with us. Use promo code: SAVE80 at checkout. May the 4th be with you, as you book those summer trips! ✈️ https://t.co/rH2oGVk5B5 

*Seats are limited. Restrictions apply.

data.text:
It was anything but a long day on Long Island! We had so much fun celebrating our new non-stop flight to @RDUAirport from @LIMacArthur. 

Fares from just $49!* https://t.co/9q4V6qfmKT

📸: Long Island MacArthur Airport

*Seats are limited. Terms and conditions apply. https://t.co/dHSM2m5KJ6

Today, we excitedly launched service from @IFlyRhodeIsland to @DENAirport & @RDUAirport. We are delighted to provide new nonstop service for the Rhode Island community to these 2 highly desirable destinations. Fares from $49 on America's Greenest Airline! https://t.co/unzfynQkjv https://t.co/twE3ykc1KX

data.text:

 💚✈️ https://t.co/MH6X1IstfS

urls.title: Green
urls.description: A whole new way to fly.

data.text:
Frontier is as green as ....

- Taking 192,457 🚗 off the road
- Planting 🌲 - 1 million acres of them
- Saving 15.2 billion plastic 💧 bottles
- ♻️ 39,500,000 trash bags
- 359 billion straws disappearing 🥤
- Saving 102 million gallons of fuel ⛽

https://t.co/2Yk5j0Deug https://t.co/6IevyMoX3j

urls.title: Airport Info
urls.description: Whether you are a first time traveler or frequent flyer, here's what to expect and be prepared for at the airport.

data.text:
Guarantee your overhead bin space with Board First. You know what they say, "If you ain't first, you're last." - Ricky Beary 

Learn more here: https://t.co/5jHI3EV8F8 https://t.co/qZY005fHDN

Puerto Rico's beloved Coqui Llanero won our Tropical Tails contest and our hearts! Check out this close-up look into the life of one of the smallest tree frogs in the world, who welcomed the @discover_PR team into its home.❤️🇵🇷 https://t.co/P1xGf9KBeD #CoquíFliesFrontier

#FrontierAirines #FlyFrontier #WeArePW #sustainability #AmericasGreenestAirline https://t.co/3v5R9ALZkG

#HappyInternationalBeaverDay! 

❓ Did you know that Beavers are good house guests? Their lodges typically contain 2 dens, 1 for drying off after entering the lodge underwater, & a 2nd, dryer den where the family will live and socialize.

📸: Thom Patterson https://t.co/qpFcV3D4I3

Meet Eric Odell, the inspiration for one of our newer @Airbus plane tails - Odell the Lynx.

Eric, a Species Conservation Program Manager for @COParksWildlife, has greatly helped in the reintroduction of the species into their natural habitat. https://t.co/92WBOFmN9X
